ModMetaData.name: Dubs Skylights TMaterials - Glass Patch
ModMetaData.author: Maaxar
ModMetaData.description:
Patches the skylights in Dubs Skylights mod to use the Glass from test's "TMaterials - Glass" mod. It will also patch the additional skylight sizes added by BJR1984's "Dubs Skylights Addon" mod.
Dubs Skylights - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=833899765 Dubs Skylights Addon - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2016959026
TMaterials - Glass - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2845463213
Also removes the "Glass Pane" recipe and item from the Dubs Skylights mod
Requires Dubs Skylights. Will not modify anything unless there is an item with the defName "TMaterials_Glass".
Not compatible with my other mod, "Dubs Skylights Glass+Lights Patch". Please choose either this mod or that mod, depending on whether you want to use the glass from "TMaterials - Glass", or the glass from "Glass+Lights"/"Just Glass".
Change Log:
Version 0.1.1.0 - Created for RimWorld version 1.4.
Version 0.1.1.1 - Added support for users still on RimWorld version 1.3.
